name: Dave Partners
overview:
Dave Partners, LLC is a premier executive search and advisory firm that is committed to exceeding client expectations.

We deliver exceptional results through search and consultative services that feature top caliber candidates, white-glove service and guaranteed satisfaction. We have a track record of performing with excellence against projects that require high quality results with precision and speed.

With over twenty-five years of combined experience securing and developing premier talent on the East Coast, we offer our services and our proven ability to secure transformational talent and build highly effective people systems for top-tier/high growth, venture capital and private equity-backed internet, ecommerce and digital media companies. The team at Dave Partners recognizes the challenges and opportunities in the start-up space, and embraces the entrepreneurial spirit of New York City’s up-and-coming internet companies.

We work with entrepreneurs, founders, boards and executive teams who fundamentally subscribe to the notion that the driving force behind the building of a great company is getting and keeping enough of the right people and that this is more important than markets or technology or competition or products. Our company is founded on the premise that our customers needs are the most important order of business. Our entire team is fully committed to exceeding those needs, resulting in a high percentage of repeat customer and referral business.

Dave Partners has placed talent with some of the East Coast’s fastest growing start-ups, and we look forward to building more successful teams. Please contact us for more information.

Our primary focus includes:

-Executive Retained Search -Executive Assessment & Coaching -Organizational Strategy/Consulting & Advisory Services -Contingency Search Services

Executive Search Services

-Board of Directors/Advisory Team Members -Chief Executive Officer/Executive & General Management -Chief Revenue Officer/Sales & Business Development -Chief Marketing Officer/Marketing Functions -Chief Technology Officer/Engineering & IT Infrastructure -Chief Product Officer/Product Development

Consulting & Advisory Services

-Compensation & Equity Modeling -Startup Toolkit -The Playbook¬ù -Payroll & Benefits Administration Setup -Policies & HR Compliance -Leadership Development

Industry Focus

-Consumer web -Mobile & Wireless -Internet, eCommerce & digital media -Open source
